org.jmc
Class MemoryMonitor

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  org.jmc.MemoryMonitor
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class MemoryMonitor
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.lang.Runnable

Memory monitor panel and thread. This class describes a thread and a GUI component that monitors the memory usage of the Java program.

Author:
danijel
